lead_paragraph: The former House speaker J. Dennis Hastert seeks to delay sentencing in his banking law conviction because of his recent hospitalization for a stroke, as well as for spinal and blood infections.

headline.print_headline: Hastert’s Lawyers Ask for a Sentencing Delay
headline.main: Dennis Hastert’s Lawyers Ask for a Sentencing Delay

snippet: The former House speaker J. Dennis Hastert seeks to delay sentencing in his banking law conviction because of his recent hospitalization for a stroke, as well as for spinal and blood infections.
abstract: Defense team representing former Republican House Speaker J Dennis Hastert asks for delay in Feb 29 sentencing on conviction for evading banking regulations; cite lingering health complications, including recent stroke, that require period of rehabilitation.
